name: Slash
desc: Caused by pushing or drawing a bladed edge to produce the force necessary to slice.

name: Hew
desc: Caused by the pressing of a bladed edge to produce the force necessary to shear.

name: Shockwave
desc: Caused by shock waves and sound.

name: Fire
desc: Caused by intense heat or combustion.

name: Electric
desc: Caused by lightning or other sources of electricity.

name: Radiant
desc: Caused specifically by divine power or sunlight.

name: Necrotic
desc: Caused by rot, decay, and undeath.

name: Bleed
desc: Caused by the loss of blood.

name: Suffocation
desc: Caused by the lack of breathable air such as drowning.

name: Spiritual
desc: Caused by spiritual sources such as ghosts or divine entities.
